context_bundle.summary: Platform Engineering Teams cover organizational patterns, responsibilities, and metrics for successful platform engineering initiatives

onboarding.quick_start: kubectl create namespace platform-engineering && kubectl apply -f platform-policies.yaml && kubectl create serviceaccount platform-team
common_patterns: Team structure: Platform team with Site Reliability Engineers, Developer Experience engineers, and Product Managers
Golden paths: 'kubectl apply -f templates/service-template.yaml' for standardized application patterns
Self-service: 'kubectl create -f catalog/service.yaml' for internal service catalog registration
Governance: OPA policies with 'package platform.enforcement' andrego rules
Observability: 'kubectl apply -f monitoring/platform-metrics.yaml' for platform-wide monitoring
Documentation: 'mkdocs serve' for platform documentation and runbooks
known_errors: Permission denied: 'kubectl auth can-i create namespaces --as=system:serviceaccount:platform:platform-team' and fix RBAC
Template adoption low: 'kubectl get applications --all-namespaces' and survey developers on template usability
Policy conflicts: 'opa test platform/policies/*' and resolve contradictory policy rules
Resource quotas exceeded: 'kubectl describe namespace <namespace>' and adjust resource quota limits
SLA not met: 'kubectl top nodes' and implement autoscaling policies for platform components
